angola.notes:
Visitors who have been granted an online pre-visa are then issued with a visa on arrival at Luanda International Airport.
For a maximum total stay of 90 days within a one year period.

argentina.notes:
Entry is allowed with a valid ID card that is less than 10 years old.
Brazilians can live and work legally in Argentina under the Mercosur (and Associated Countries) immigration agreement with no requirement other than being a Brazilian citizen for over 5 years and passing a background check.

australia.notes: May apply online (Online Visitor e600 visa).

austria.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

belgium.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

benin.notes: Must have an international vaccination certificate.

bolivia.notes:
Entry is allowed with a valid ID card that is less than 10 years old.
Brazilians can live and work legally in Bolivia under the Mercosur (and Associated Countries) immigration agreement with no requirement other than being a Brazilian citizen for over 5 years and passing a background check.

canada.notes: Brazilian citizens who have held a Canadian visa in the last 10 years or who hold a valid United States non-immigrant visa can enter Canada solely with an eTA when arriving by air.

chile.notes:
Entry is allowed with a valid ID card that is less than 10 years old.
Brazilians can live and work legally in Chile under the Mercosur (and Associated Countries) immigration agreement with no requirement other than being a Brazilian citizen for over 5 years and passing a background check.

china.notes:
72-hour visit without a visa when in transit at Changsha, Chengdu, Chongqing, Guangzhou, Guilin, Harbin, Kunming, Qingdao, Wuhan, Xi'an and Xiamen.144-hours visit without a visa when in transit through Beijing Capital International Airport, Dalian, Hangzhou, Shijiazhuang Zhengding International Airport in Hebei, Nanjing, Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport and Shanghai Pudong International Airport, Shanghai Railway Station and the Port of Shanghai); Shenyang and Tianjin Binhai International Airport
Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan do count as third countries under the 72 and 144-hours visa-free visit transit policy.

colombia.notes:
Entry is allowed with a valid ID card that is less than 10 years old.
Brazilians can live and work legally in Colombia under the Mercosur (and Associated Countries) immigration agreement with no requirement other than being a Brazilian citizen for over 5 years and passing a background check.

côte_d'ivoire.notes: eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

czech_republic.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

denmark.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

ecuador.notes:
Entry is allowed with a valid ID card that is less than 10 years old.
Brazilians can live and work legally in Ecuador under the Mercosur (and Associated Countries) immigration agreement with no requirement other than being a Brazilian citizen for over 5 years and passing a background check.

estonia.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

finland.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

france.notes:
3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area
Visa usually required for French Guiana, but some exemptions apply (see French Guiana entry below)

gabon.notes: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

gambia.notes: An entry clearance must be obtained from the Gambian Immigration prior to travel.

germany.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

greece.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

guyana.notes: Brief visits just to the border town of Lethem are possible with a valid Brazilian ID card

hungary.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

iceland.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

india.notes:
e-Visa holders must arrive via 25 designated airports[Note 1] or 3 designated seaports.[Note 2]
An Indian e-Tourist Visa can only be obtained twice in one calendar year.

italy.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

laos.notes:
Conditions apply.
Available at international airports Luangphabang, Pakse, Savannakhet and Vientiane, and at 4 land borders Friendship Bridge,[Note 3] and at 13 border crossings[Note 4] as well as Tanalaeng train station in Vientiane, which connects to the train station in Nongkai, Thailand.
Entry points Lalai, Lantui, Meuang mom, Pakxan, and Phoudou are open only to visa holders.
Extendable up to 60 days.

latvia.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

lebanon.notes: Brazilian immigrants, or Brazilian businessmen are granted a multiple entry visa on arrival valid for 90 days for tourism purposes only and is renewable once following the approval of the General Directorate of General Security. This visa however shall not exceed 90 days.

liechtenstein.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

lithuania.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

luxembourg.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

malawi.notes: Can extend for a total of 90 days.

malta.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

myanmar.notes: eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports.

netherlands.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

norway.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

pakistan.notes: Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply.

paraguay.notes:
Entry is allowed with a valid ID card that is less than 10 years old.
Brazilians can live and work legally in Paraguay under the Mercosur (and Associated Countries) immigration agreement with no requirement other than being a Brazilian citizen for over 5 years and passing a background check.

Brazilians can live and work legally in Peru under the Mercosur (and Associated Countries) immigration agreement with no requirement other than being a Brazilian citizen for over 5 years and passing a background check.

poland.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

portugal.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

qatar.notes: Available at Hamad International Airport. eVisa is also available.

slovakia.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

slovenia.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

somalia.notes: Available at Bosaso Airport, Galcaio Airport and Mogadishu Airport.

spain.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

sweden.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

switzerland.notes: 3 months during a 6 months period following the date of first entry in the Schengen Area

tajikistan.notes: E-visa holders can enter through all border points.

united_states.notes: Tourist visas are issued with validity of up to 10 years.

uruguay.notes:
Entry is allowed with a valid ID card that is less than 10 years old.
Brazilians can live and work legally in Uruguay under the Mercosur (and Associated Countries) immigration agreement with no requirement other than being a Brazilian citizen for over 5 years and passing a background check.

uzbekistan.notes: 5-day visa free transit when in transit at the international airports on condition of holding a confirmed onward ticket for a flight to a third country.

venezuela.notes: Entry is allowed with a valid ID card that is less than 10 years old.

vietnam.notes:
Prearranged visa obtained online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Phu Quoc or Da Nang airports.
Phú Quốc without a visa for up to 30 days.

zambia.notes: Also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zimbabwe.

zimbabwe.notes: For tourism purposes only also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zambia.
